website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality blend of Italian, Spanish and Greek olive oils. The rich flavor will keep you coming back for more.
pros: Colavita is a smooth extra virgin olive oil with a rich, prominent olive flavor
The oil solidifies when stored in the fridge – a sign of quality olive oil
Add a burst of flavor to your salad, or use as a healthier alternative to butter on bread
The oil is gentle enough to incorporate into your beauty routine as well
Bring a healthy, hydrated glow to dry, damaged skin and hair
We love the beautifully designed bottle as well
cons: Sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Highly flavorful
customer_reviews.text: It has a VERY strong flavor, making it great for savory dressings, sauces, etc. The flavor is savory, vinegary, bitter, and very rich. For the price, you'er not going to get a more flavor-rich olive oil. Probably. I mean, what do I know?
customer_reviews.author: IWriteNiceReviewsWhileStoned

customer_reviews.title: Should have heeded the photos
customer_reviews.text: Great olive oil, but arrived completely smashed. Since I store my olive oil in a glass bottle, I decided to try to carefully open it up. I got a huge spurt of olive oil all over myself and the counter, so now it's too messy to even return without the oil spilling because the bottle cap was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Duke

customer_reviews.title: This is priced fairly and tastes fine. Of course there are other brands that are ...
customer_reviews.text: My son's Italian girlfriend says no Italian would use any other store brand. This is priced fairly and tastes fine. Of course there are other brands that are much more expensive, but for everyday cooking, this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great olive oil for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Same product as in store, better price and delivered to my door. Love it. Don't let some of the pseudo-snobs on here tell you any different, this is a good solid olive oil, good flavor and reasonably priced. I have been to olive first pressings before and yes, there is better olive oil out there. But if you are looking for a good every day product, don't hesitate to buy this. I'd love to have Japanese Wagyu prime rib everyday, but I'm not going to whine and complain if I get a good old fashion choice bone-in rib eye. Nor should you.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST tasting olive oil I've tried. It cooks foods so well and is much healthier than veggie or corn oils. I use this for bread dipping and all my frying. This is a GREAT price on this half-gallon jug since it costs nearly double at the grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: possibly fake
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this brand Colavita from the grocery store but this item on Amazon is of dubious quality. High-quality EVOO freezes or at least semi solidifies when in the refrigerator. This one, when added to a salad dressing, etc. remains in a pourable, semi-viscous condition. This EVOO is possibly mixed with a lower-priced, inferior seed oil or vegetable oil. Will not be buying from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Tulkinghorn, Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Olive Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love buying olive oil in bulk and using a smaller jar on the kitchen counter. This brand is supposed to be really good and it is in a convent plastic container. Beware of packaging with smaller items because it bent in the huge jar.
customer_reviews.author: Fav

customer_reviews.title: Fine oil, awful packaging
customer_reviews.text: We get this oil through subscribe and save and are quite happy with it as our every day olive oil. But what you need to know is that you’re going to be needing a pair of needle nose pliers along with your oil because the loop meant to pull open the oil ALWAYS BREAKS. This is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Vigeant

customer_reviews.title: Colavita in a plastic container
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Colavita olive oil as my go-to olive oiI. This was the first Colavita olive oil I've ever even seen in a plastic container. I immediately decanted half of this olive oil into a glass Colavita olive oil bottle. It tasted like the glass bottled oil. A few weeks later I decanted the rest of the olive oil into the same glass bottle. It too tasted like regular Colavita olive oil. I am very sensitive to the plastic flavors that permeate bottled water over time. I try not to buy olive oil in plastic and will not purchase it again in plastic. I prefer to continue to recycle glass bottles.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN

customer_reviews.title: Love this olive oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different olive oils and this one is by far the best. I love the creaminess and flavor. Not too strong. I use it on everything and it mixes well with vinegar and herbs. Take a Triscuit, add a bit of cranberry Stilton and a a sliced plum tomato. Sprinkle with basil and a trace of rosemary, drizzle Colavita over the top...instant lunch or fabulous appetizer! Yumminess! Oh it's also great for cooking. This may be my new butter!
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Gal Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good oil.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of running out of olive oil. This certainly doesn't replace my nice olive oil, but it makes darn sure that i'll always have some around. love the large size, the oil is really nice - but not your fancy straight from sicily stuff, but it does the trick. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: wn1456

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, check who you are buying from!
customer_reviews.text: This is great oil. I have purchased several times from Amazon and even setup a subscribe and save when a really good deal came around. It is SO IMPORTANT to check who you are purchasing from. There are a lot of reviews of people getting fake or completely different oil. Of my 5 deliveries so far every single one was the correct oil and worked very well. I highly recommend this product and it is unfortunate others have had so many issues. I hope this review helps!
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: NOT OLIVE OIL
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT olive oil. It has been in my refrigerator for days and not one sign of cloudiness not to mention solidification. Also, very harsh taste. Mine was from Greece and Portugal.
customer_reviews.author: RVF

customer_reviews.title: If it's olive oil, it's quite good.  It tastes like it to me, but. . .
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for more than a year. The price is good. The flavor has been generally good enough to use in salad dressing or to finish food. It's a solid staple. Is it certified to be 100% olive oil? There have been problems, particularly in Italy, with adulteration of olive oil by big companies. If it's certified, there should be a prominent stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Ross, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't spend this much on olive oil but after trying this I don't think I'll ever go back to the less expensive brands. Mixed it with balsamic vinegar and fresh French bread and the flavor was marvelous. Not too heavy so it doesn't overwhelm the balsamic flavor. It cooks clean and really enhances any dish I've made so far. Oh, and the bottle came sealed inside a bubble wrap suit, if you will. Secure enough I had to cut the wrap to get the bottle out. Pretty sure it ruined me from buying cheaper olive oil again and I'm okay with that. All around positive experience with Colavita.
customer_reviews.author: ShyReader

customer_reviews.title: Love this olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorites in olive oil. But the product was smashed and I cannot used the product. Very disappointed about the handling of this product. A lot of money for this product that I cannot use
customer_reviews.author: dpuz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed with this product ! The oil itself is A-grade , and the packaging was awesomely, securely done. The ( beautiful !) bottles were cold at the time of delivery. I'm impressed
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use to moisturize my skin while in the shower !! Really amazing results better than any cream Naturally moisturize and tight the skin
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Armando

customer_reviews.title: Love the price.
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn't use wesson oil and rather use this to cook with and at the stores we shop around our home you can't buy a big bottle and the little bottles are expensive we buy this and it last at least 4 months sometimes more. So a good price he also uses to other oil that we buy from amazon with big bottles and they are expensive at one time but last for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Colavita never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: Colavita is renowned for its high-quality products. This oil is no exception. I will continue to buy it. My only wish is that Colavita would sell a lightly filtered oil that maintains some of the pulp. I have had this kind of olive oil, & now I am spoiled. Really, that stuff is good enough to sip from a shot glass. No joke!
customer_reviews.author: Stravo Lukos

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged: Covid-19 Prevents Return
customer_reviews.text: This is great olive oil, and we use regularly. It's good for cooking, salad dressing, and finishing. However, it wasn't packed properly and the cap and spout were bent and depressed into the body of the bottle. We're going to have to transfer it into an empty Colavita bottle. I'd return it, but it would be a mess to pack, and we're self-isolating, I don't want to go to UPS or have hand to hand contact with someone to pick it up. So we'll make the best of it we can.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Product Fine.  Packaging Weak
customer_reviews.text: Colavita is a good product. Price was fair. The packaging left the bottle's spout pressed down into the bottle. With much effort I brought most of the neck out so as to be usable. I was afraid the plastic would crack leaving olive oil all over the sink. Fortunately that didn't happen. The box used was too small with no protective padding.
customer_reviews.author: Valuefinder

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: TOP WAS FULLY MASHED INTO THE BOTTLE. Flavor WAS NOT AN EVOO. Very BITTER OR RANCID, or UNRIPE OLIVES WERE USED. WILL NOT BUT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: SmilingEyes

customer_reviews.title: I like it..!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many olive oil's, both expensive and medium priced and this is in my opinion is just a good as the very expensive one's I've tried. Tastes good to me, cooks well and is priced very reasonable. I have no complaints about this olive oil and will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Bitter & rancid
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil tastes rancid. I have never had such a bad tasting olive oil. It makes everything I use it on taste terribly bitter.
customer_reviews.author: CW of NJ

customer_reviews.title: This arrived rancid.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was crushed and spoiled before I could ever use it.
customer_reviews.author: frederick

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil I use it every day . I cook every day I am Italian 86years old olive oil an garlic what a smell. This oli. Is my favored I bought 8 bottles for 8.99. I should have have bought more . Love love it the best. I also bought the candy but make sure you by First cold press. Very important thank you. Mrs s please try this olive oil. I ment to say I bought the cans .i don’t like the cans I like the bottles better. Ok I am finished......
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Santucci

customer_reviews.title: Best price. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite oil by far! It has a fresh sweet flavor that's robust. You don't need much which I like. There's really no purpose in using olive oil if you can't really taste it and you'll wind up using too much. This was definitely a great price for such a large bottle too! Olive oil can obscenely over priced. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but healthy
customer_reviews.text: First cold pressed is important because no heat is applied which can destroy polyphenols. Extra virgin is a misleading term Always get first cold pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Average EVOO for a premium price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a bottle of EVOO that I purchased at Ocean State, for 50% the cost of this bottle. After using it, I see no reason to spend 2x's the money. Its of an average quality for a premium price. If you want regular EVOO then hit up Ocean State or other places, its far cheaper. This gets 3 stars only because I didn't have to leave my house to get it, otherwise It would just get 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Greener

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: It was late three days,I needed it when I needed it,NOT THREE days later,I had no use for it after that date,I discarded it in the trash...is it good or bad,I will never know,nor do I care.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Already bitter
customer_reviews.text: Hello ! I am having a very negative experience about buying food items from Amazon. This extra virgin olive oil , bought no more than 3 months ago , has already bitter in flavor. No good for eating ! Be ADVISED !
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a high quality healthy olive oil that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a high quality healthy olive oil that contains the types of oils that are most effective in lowering risk for cardiovascular disease
customer_reviews.author: tough critic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Colavita has always been my "go-to" brand for olive oil and this is the real thing and at a fantastic price. This is my second time ordering and I now I don't look else-where to buy it. Arrives so well packed and fresh. Delightful. Fantastic flavour and aroma. And, as I say, it arrives so well packaged. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Judah Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for cooking
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this olive oil is very good, however I only use it for cooking, and not as a dressing. I did find however that the price was a bit expensive (per ounce) in comparison to what I’ve paid for this same exact Olive oil at local retailers. Also be aware that this oil is a combination of oils from different regions of Europe, so no two bottles will takes exactly the same. But overall it works for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: PotterBook

customer_reviews.title: right bottle for quality olive oil
customer_reviews.text: good value for versatile olive oil. Package was damaged and neck of the bottle was cracked slightly. minimal leakage though very hot having sat in the delivery van sun apparently. Really like the brand but with poor packaging, bottle was floating free with too little support; and shipping it is too risky.
customer_reviews.author: elliott

customer_reviews.title: THE best Olive Oil, EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Just the BEST. BEST flavor, BEST labeling, BEST price. Only purchase THIS brand and only from Amazon. Donna.
customer_reviews.author: AmazomDonnaBestEver

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see. Super delicious taste!
customer_reviews.text: Came good. Recieve it at time and this big guy is totally worth the money. It tastes really good, although is a mix of olives but it has that olive oil deep flavor which is awesome. The value is amazing. Is a lot of oil for just 20 bugs and u cant find this quality at markets is just too expensive to get an oil on supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lira

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Best Value
customer_reviews.text: For my money, this is the best overall quality and value in a first press extra virgin olive oil. I have never had a bad product from Colavita, they consistently offer high quality products at a reasonable price. This is no exception. I am very pleased with this and will certainly be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and aroma
customer_reviews.text: Olive oil arrived in good packaging with no leaks. Twist cap resists stripping more than other olive oil containers. Aroma and flavor are similar to olive oil I have used in past. This brand worked perfect when used in a tomato sauce with mushrooms. Expiration is years from date of purchase. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena & Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I use this in all of my cooking. It is part of the Mediterranean diet that I like. My favorite cook, Lydia Bastianich uses this oil in her cooking show!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Flanery

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil makes everything taste so good. I even use a little when I fry tortillas for wraps, couldn't believe how flaky and yummy it made them, wraps are what I consider a bland item. Such a large jar, great value for the money. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat inconsistent (depending on a bottle)
customer_reviews.text: There can be definite variance between bottles of this oil. I just opened the second bottle and the taste is not the same. Some inspection of the sticker showed that the one I liked better was sourced in Spain and Greece, and the one that I like less is sourced in Portugal and Greece. It's right there on the sticker. Therefore, there will be variance. I will definitely enjoy the rest of the bottle but will continue my search for a more consistent flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, don't be shy with it! Pour it on!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has a deep rich olive flavor. Just taking the cap off you can smell this oil it smells so good, your going to crave some bread to dip it in! But that's not all, I ha e used it for marinades, and even for frying. It has a high burn rate, excellent for frying fish or shellfish.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lambert

customer_reviews.title: blended olives
customer_reviews.text: September 2018 i bought 100% certified Italian olives. I thought this in December 2019 thinking it was the same item. It is not. It is a blend of olives from different regions in the mediterrannean. If you want 100% italian olives pay $2 more and search for "premium". DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer and sports lover

customer_reviews.title: Good blend
customer_reviews.text: It's not 100% Italian, mine was labeled blend from Greece and Portugal. However, the taste was fine, and good for my type of cooking. For a few dollars more you can search for the Premium brand, which is the 100% Italian blend. The BBO is 8/2021. It will be long gone before that date.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Short expiration date
customer_reviews.text: When I receive this item, it’s only 3 months to expire. Therefore. I decided to return right away. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Peace0857$

customer_reviews.title: Container damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is just an FYI. I'm not asking for a refund or return. The problem is the container had a broken cap, so I cannot open and close it as usual. Fortunately, the seal insert was secure so it didn't leak. I plan to pour the oil into another container once it's empty. The bottle was slightly banged up also. It was packaged along in a box, but very loosely in the box. There was only 2 of those airbags for insulation, but there should have been at least 8-10 more. The bottle was clearly bouncing all over the box while it was being shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavour
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect the best most delicious olive oil. If you want the best, you must pay for it. Olive is still the only oil you should use for whatever purpose. First cold press is a good sign, but the type and quality of olives used are more important.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brechner

customer_reviews.title: Pure
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of this olive oil is excellent. There is a distinct 'burn" in the back of the mouth when swallowing which is understand is one of the confirmations of good quality. I have read that some of the brands of olive oil are diluted when bottled.
customer_reviews.author: dasparks

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: 2 bottles is much more than I can use in a short amount of time before it turns rancid, as all oil does. Next time I will order 1 !
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: A strong and tasty flavored olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow, how much I like virgin oil. I like Virgin Quality because the flavor is strong. I don't like regular untasty olive oil, it ends being too expensive to invest in a non tasting olicr oil
customer_reviews.author: Victor H Baske

customer_reviews.title: So many uses
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. So versatile for all sorts of cooking. Also makes a great hair mask. Leaves my hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Packard

customer_reviews.title: Not a connessuier, but it works!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an Olive Oil connessuier, but, I think as Olive oil goes this taste good. I use it mostly for small quantity frying and baking, so it works. Would be better in a glass bottle rather than plastic, but hey, that would definitely cost more!
customer_reviews.author: Mz Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Very good for My African American Hair
customer_reviews.text: Very good for My African American Hair! I love the Beautiful Bottles! Well worth it! Came packed, very well! I am always pleased with Amazon!!Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: curtid davis

customer_reviews.title: Bottle had been opened
customer_reviews.text: The bottle of olive oil was not full. Its seal had been broken and a fourth of it was missing. I want it replaced. I can send photos. Also the cans of crabmeat were dented that were in the shipment with olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sennette

customer_reviews.title: exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that is always in my cabinet. Keep a small bottle beside my stove and use it constantly. Love the taste. The pricing is great also
customer_reviews.author: Bill Eddings

customer_reviews.title: Love this Extra virgin olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Superb. Love it for all my cooking!! Excellent olive oil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil has a nice taste, it's not bland and not too strong. The product was also shipped packaged great, wrapped tightly in an air bubble type wrap fit for it and then boxed. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: plowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil has a great flavor to it! We use this all the time around our home! It’s great to cook with or chop up some garlic, a dash of salt & dip your bread in it!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this olive oil. I’ve used several bottles by now and am always happy with the product. Great quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: The Squirrel USMC

customer_reviews.title: Too oily
customer_reviews.text: It is way over priced! just saw the same one at Kroger for $13. I paid 50% marked up
customer_reviews.author: Master L

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!! TASTING
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST tasting Olive Oil I have ever tasted or purchased!
customer_reviews.author: karla g

customer_reviews.title: Mild light flavor in dark glass at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Olive oil taste preference it different for each person. We like this brand for several reasons....it isn't stupidly expensive, it comes in dark glass....better flavor protection, and it is a light, mildly fruity flavor....nothing strong about it. Everyone has a different taste requirement for olive oil but this one is very much to our liking....I can use it in cooking or for salad dressing.....
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: I like trying new products like variety
customer_reviews.text: I been using olive oil for a while now never have had this size before now I don’t have to keep buying more for a while brought two this and another brand
customer_reviews.author: Edwina F.

customer_reviews.title: Good olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, but the lid was broken when it arrived. There was no loss of oil, however, because of the inner pull off type of inner protective seal. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormish

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor for dipping, or cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Love this olive oil! We ate at a local Carrabas, got free..take home lasagna, with a meal; included was a couple of packets of olive oil w/the bread. Found this same oil on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really an olive oil snob, but do buy some pretty expensive oil when you are cooking something that the flavor has to shine...otherwise this oil is great for regular meals. I use a lot of it!
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.text: Had used this brand before, but could not get to grocery to pick up more, as quarantined; so these came promptly. Use for cooking, not dipping. Perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: gpdooby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic olive oil. I'm very pleased with the flavor. I'll be ordering this again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mafalda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavor; healthy source of fats
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste this has added to some of my dishes. The previous olive oil I bought was much less intense, so I'm quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Torin McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Being a first timer using this brand, I was impressed at how well I can cook with it, and use it on my bread in place of butter. No telltale taste and doesn't require using a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Susterich

customer_reviews.title: Paid too much!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it until a week after I bought the olive oil my local grocery store had the same thing on sale for $12.99. I won't make that mistake again. Everything else was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Greenan

customer_reviews.title: bottle was damaged
customer_reviews.text: This arrive in a timely matter but the entire top had been mashed in so the pouring spout was indented i though i would be able to still use but once i did i found the oil ran every where so i have to use a funnel to pour it i didn't contact seller of this because i figured it was too late. i will not order again just because of this but your order might arrive totally fine
customer_reviews.author: Beverly T.Hooks

customer_reviews.title: This extra virgin olive oil has a wonderful flavor and very useful in many ways!  *10* Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flavor for cooking and salads. It's scent is mild enough that I can mix it with a few drops of frankincense essential oil and wear it as a fragrance, as well as applying it to my hair. Very, very pleased with Cola Vita's extra virgin olive oil!
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love this olive oil. It is peppery and is just wonderful. I will never buy my extra virgin olive oil from Sam's Club again. It's great to make fresh spinach and garlic sauce for pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great oil to use in all your cooking.!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package the top of the bottle was smashed in. could not pour it without making a mess.! You guys have to find a better way to ship items like olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it for cooking rather than butter or margarine.
customer_reviews.author: Sabry Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Only complaint is the bottle was pretty beat up, but that could be the shippers/packagers doing.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS COLD-PRESSED OLIVE OIL
customer_reviews.text: We use olive oil every single day at our house. Aside from being in a plastic bottle rather than glass, we loved this olive oil. It has an enticing flavor. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Colavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil worth getting
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about Colavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil. It’s the best for me & makes food tastes so good. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: It's cold pressed !
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and the amount will last for at least a month or more seems very fresh as well
customer_reviews.author: Marie Washington

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting olive oil ever
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this stuff for years. It's so tasty. Has a great aroma, too. I messed up n. Ordered too much one time. No worries. We used it all.
customer_reviews.author: happy in tn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad that I could order this from Amazon. We are basically in coronavirus lockdown. It came through shipping just fine. I love this olive oil by Colavita. Having this makes life a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Olson

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen must
customer_reviews.text: Delicious Olive Oil. Great quality. The packaging was perfect and the price too. A must for cooking with or making dressings
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Rankins

customer_reviews.title: The right oil for the job!
customer_reviews.text: From working in a special italian deli this is the oil we'd use on some great italian hoagies (Philly!). I use it on everything now from raw applications to a pan fry or saute. Ordering in bulk is a lot cheaper than picking up this brand in-store and with subscribe & save you can depend on always having a good supply. Good on everything but nothe best for high-temperature frying, it'll lose its flavor then you're better off going with the cheaper stuff. Low and slow!
customer_reviews.author: C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Can't remove cap!
customer_reviews.text: Colavita is my favorite EVO, so I have really wrestled to get the cap off, even using tools. Can't send a message to Colavita (no button to give seller feedback). I am hoping Colavita/Amazon will see this and send a bottle I can open!
customer_reviews.author: SoOHJo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: Great oil, was surprised to get such a fine product at this price from an online source. Pleasantly surprised, I'll be using this brand olive oil from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L DiGregorio

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor this is top quality we love Italian foods and cooking pizza with this or lasagna is perfect the flavor in the crusts of breads makes us want to eat that first
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: so many health pluses
customer_reviews.text: this is the only liquid oil that I will use..
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Gors

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bottles
customer_reviews.text: The oil tastes good, but I would prefer a glass bottle, plastic gives out chemicals. Sometimes I wonder why all the good stuff is stored so badly.
customer_reviews.author: StormRider

customer_reviews.title: Best olive oil on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best olive oil on Amazon or the world for this price. I’d put it up against any olive oil at double it’s price
customer_reviews.author: Gene Mock

customer_reviews.title: I have a olive garden cant process what is in this bottle
customer_reviews.text: 100% pure olibe oil!! Cold press too What do you want more than that?May be price high but wwhat you pay what u get
customer_reviews.author: notolerancefordishonesty

customer_reviews.title: Beware of expiration date. Buy in a store.
customer_reviews.text: Beware of expiration date. I got this on subscribe and save and bottle I received expires in 3 months. It’s pretty difficult to use 2 liters of olive oil in 3 months. I’ll pay more for quality EVOO.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: One of the smoothest tasting Olive Oils
customer_reviews.text: Love the rich smooth taste of this olive oil, specially mixed with Balsamic vinegar as a bread dip. Great for cooking also.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: Good price and great taste
customer_reviews.text: The price is good compared to other locations. We love the flavor of this oil and use it in almost everything. Did purchase another dispenser to make usage easier but after receiving the bottle it is not really needed just for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bell

customer_reviews.title: Need special handling
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good one but packaging is not a good one and need to be improved as it arrived damaged
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, fast shipper
customer_reviews.text: The taste is robust and such a great price for the size. I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: cmturner007

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, easy purchase, good value. Also, a Kosher product which is often hard to find in this area.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn B

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this olive oil for years. Great flavor and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri A.

product_meta.title: Colavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 34 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Size:34 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Style:Olive Oil| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingColavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil is the perfect every day oil with delicate flavor that has the perfect balance of fruity and spicy notes. We have sourced selections from new harvest oils to create this traditional Colavita flavor, which has been the trademark of the Colavita family legacy. It is an ideal oil for virtually all of your cooking needs, from light sauté ing to drizzling over your favorite dishes. During the colder months, olive oil will congeal during shipping. This is normal, natural, and will not disturb the quality of the oil. Please allow congealed oil to rest at room temperature for 24 hours.
feature_bullets: Imported from Italy. Cold production obtained exclusively from olives harvested from the finest groves in Europe. Contains oil from one or more of the following countries: Italy, Greece, Spain, Portugal.

First cold press. Colavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil is the quintessential every day oil with delicate flavor that has the perfect balance of fruity and spicy notes. Perfect for roasting baking dressing and marinades.
This product bares The North American Olive Oil Association (NAOOA) Quality Seal and has been tested for both quality and authenticity according to the International Olive Council (IOC) standards.
Two time winner "Best Everyday Cooking Oil" in Men's Health magazine's Annual Nutrition Awards.
Cholesterol and Carbohydrate Free Product. Certified OU Kosher.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
